reviewText: I love Ben Speer& his brother and sisters. They are and were so amazing gospel singers.
A must cd for anyone who loves Ben Speer.  Especially dear to me now that Ben is no longer with us.  Contains many of the Speer Family's best songs.

My wife and I have thoroughly enjoyed the Best of Ben Speer - each time we have watched it!  It has a delightful blend of beautiful, anointed singing linked with insights of a man who is at peace with himself and with God, even though he has faced some rough times over the years. Ben comes through as a quality believer walking in true selfless humility that honours the Lord Jesus and enjoys life to the full.

Best of Ben Speer is enhanced by the variety of lovely Christian songs presented, and also by the insightful interviews with Bill Gaither. We have no hesitation in highly recommending this DVD.
